actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Fire Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales fire in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Sleep Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.
